transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello good evening sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan aa rahi hai bataiye.
Executive: Sir meri baat Ranjeet agency mein ho rahi hai. Dinesh sir se.
Executive: Nahi main Dinesh baat kar raha hu sir.
Executive: Ji sir sir aapke yaha pe concern aaya tha ki aap irrelevant buyleads aa rahi India mart mein.
Executive: Shahdab bol raha hu sir India mart se aapka account manager.
Customer: Haan actually mujhe irrelevant buyleads aa rahi hai but mujhe to specific chahiye like se jaise ki Bangalore ho gaya Delhi ho gaya apna.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Waha se mujhe show nahi ho rahi.
Executive: Sir isse pehle maine connect kiya tha takriban sir 45 din ho gaye uske baad se main continuously connect kar raha hu. Sir ye number kiska hai jo isme main bata raha hu aapko. Starting mein sir 73 starting hai last mein 5387 hai.
Customer: Haan mujhe nahi idea hoga aapko.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Mujhe nahi idea hoga is tarah se.
Customer: Kyunki aap primary number pe phone kar rahe hain India mart wale?
Executive: Ji ji primary number pe call kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Wo Dinesh bhai handle kar rahe hain.
Executive: Sir to sir reason ye hai na ki sir continuously na usi mein call karta hu. Kyunki jo number sir yaha pe register hoga to main usi pe hi call karunga. Service ke regarding pe. Haan 45 din pehle meri unse discussion hua tha ki unhone bola tha ki kuch reason the uski wajah se hum India mart ki services use nahi kar rahe the. To maine kaha sir koi na sir aap aap se use kariye aur jo bhi dikkat ho aap mujhe directly contact karke aap mujhe bataiye. Uske baad se sir main khud hi aap unko sir ko continuously contact kiya hu lekin sir waha se call pick nahi ho pa raha tha. To aaj sir ye aaj concern aaya tha shayad aapne call kiya hoga.
Customer: Haan mere number se maine aapko do teen bar call kiya hoga aapne dekhte honge shayad.
Customer: Ye na. Hello.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Haan ye number se aapko do bar call aaya hoga. Ek aaya hoga char din pehle aur ek aaya hoga uske ek do din pehle ka.
Executive: To sir aapka number spam to nahi show hota.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Aapka number spam to nahi show hota.
Customer: Main samjha nahi.
Executive: Matlab ye hota hai na ki sir jaise hum kisi number se continuously call karte rehte hain na to number spam pe chala jata hai. Jab spam pe chala jata hai mere paas hai true caller. To true caller mein ye hota hai ki agar koi humko call kar raha hai na to spam ki wajah se hamara true caller jo hota hai automatically wo call reject kar deta hai ya to waha se ring hota rehta hai yaha pe reject kar deta hai.
Customer: Okay. Haan to iski wajah se receive nahi hua hoga mera.
Customer: Mujhe sirf ye mera issue hai wo zara solve karwa dijiye na ho paye to.
Executive: Open karta hu main aapki profile. Haan ek bar open kariye.
Executive: Sir hamara jo main location hai jaise hum Gujarat ke. Surat Gujarat. Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To agar present time pe yaha pe dekhu to kuch buyleads hai agar main Surat Gujarat pe hi filter lagata hu.
Customer: Nahi mujhe Surat ki buyleads nahi chahiye main wahi bata raha hu aapko.
Executive: Achcha Surat ki nahi chahiye.
Customer: Nahi mujhe Surat ki buyleads nahi chahiye kyunki Surat mein kya hai ki hub hai pura.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Jo price mere ko chahiye wo price Surat mein mujhe nahi milegi.
Executive: Okay sir. Okay to main sir India India. To main India ka filter laga India ka hi filter laga deta hu sir. India ka filter hai usme maine India pe main jab filter laga ke karta hu na sir. Ji ji. Tabhi wo mujhe na matlab jo mujhe buyleads dusri jagah mujhe dikh rahi hai wo apne portal pe nahi dikh rahi. To sir abhi aapke paas wo portal hai matlab aap aapne login login kar rakha hai. Phone pe login hai sir mera. Haan phone koi dikkat nahi phone pe hi main dikha dunga sir. Ek kam kariye main aapko ek link share kar raha hu aapke register mail id pe aayega wo. Register mere paas. Ji. Wo mere paas nahi hoga actually jo register hai na wo pura Jignesh bhai ke hath Jignesh bhai abhi na wo kaise ki wo call uthaye na uthaye aisa hai. To ek kam karta hu main aapko whatsapp pe share kar du aap usme wo login hai ki nahi login India mart. Nahi mere phone mein login hai India mart. Haan India mart phone mein login hai. Theek hai main aapko ek kam karta hu yaha se link share karta hu main aapke personal whatsapp number pe share kar deta hu. To whatsapp number se aap join kar lijiyega main kam jo rahega hamara India mart ka hi hai. Kyunki agar India mart login nahi ho pa hota to main aapko sir dikha nahi pata. Okay. Ya to main apni screen share kar dunga aapko yaha se hum dekh lena. Sure sure. Haan. Okay to mera number likh lijiye ya hai aapke paas kyunki aapka number yaha pe India mart pe show ho raha hai isliye. Haan ye main cheez pata hai sir ye abhi to mera personal number nahi aa raha hoga aapke paas. Ye aapka sir 93135591 ye hai na sir number. Ji ji ji. Haan. To main isi pe aapko sir bhej raha hu. Okay bhej dijiye main dekh leta hu. Dekhiye aapko message receive hoga meri taraf se hi ka. Ek second. Haan ho gaya receive.
Executive: Sir dekhiye maine aapko link share kiya hai video call link ka. Usko aap join kariye. Okay theek hai main phone cut kar deta hu ya phone chalu rakhu. Nahi nahi phone cut kar dijiye koi dikkat nahi usko join kar lijiye. Okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving irrelevant buyleads in IndiaMART.

- Not seeing specific buyleads from Bangalore, Delhi.

- Number might be showing as spam.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's profile.

- Offered to share screen to resolve the issue.

- Shared a video call link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, spam, video call
